bootstrap_wrapper package¶

Submodules¶

bootstrap_wrapper.document module¶

v2.document¶

Holds our base document template for a bootstrap document.
class bootstrap_wrapper.document.BootstrapDocument(*args, *, bootstrap_url='https://maxcdn.bootstrapcdn.com/bootstrap/3.3.6', jquery_url='https://ajax.googleapis.com/ajax/libs/jquery/1.12.0/jquery.min.js', static_folder=None, **kwargs)¶

Bases: bootstrap_wrapper.document.Document

BootstrapDocument.

Adds bootstrap and jquery to a document, with the option to specify a local file system path to load it from or a cdn path.

The following tags are available to add items to.

Head:

The head tag of the document.
Meta:

Stores meta tags inside of the head tag.
Content:

A <div class=’container’ id=’content’> tag. Calling the add method of a document adds items inside of this tag.
Body:

The body of the document.
Scripts:

A <div> below the content, to add <script> tags to.
Parameters:
  • bootstrap_url – A cdn url or path to a static folder.
  • jquery_url – A cdn url or path to a static folder.
  • static_folder – A path in the file system to load from.
add(*items)¶

Adds items to the content div by default.

class bootstrap_wrapper.document.Document(title='Dominate', doctype='<!DOCTYPE html>', request=None)¶

Bases: dominate.document.document

Just passes render through Markup.

class bootstrap_wrapper.elements.Glyphicon(*args, *, icon_name='home', href=None, **kwargs)¶

Bases: bootstrap_wrapper.elements.Tag

A glyphicon element.

If this element is called with an href then it returns and <a> tag with the appropriate class’s, else it defaults to a <span> tag.

tagname = 'span'¶

class bootstrap_wrapper.elements.TableHeader(*items, **kwargs)¶

Bases: bootstrap_wrapper.elements.Tag

A table header element.

add(*items)¶

Adds items to the row. Makes sure items are wrapped in <th> tag.

tagname = 'thead'¶
class bootstrap_wrapper.elements.TableRow(*items, *, header=False, info=False, success=False, warning=False, danger=False, **kwargs)¶

Bases: bootstrap_wrapper.elements.Tag

A row in a TableHeader or TableBody element.

add(*items)¶

Adds items to the table row, items are wrapped in a <td> tag if self.header is False, else they are wrapped in a <th> tag.

tagname = 'tr'¶

A Form Group holds a label, field, and any errors associated with a field. This is primarily used with a WTForm field.

bootstrap_wrapper.navigation module¶

v2.navigation¶

Holds elements for our navigation classes. (Tabbar and Navbar)
class bootstrap_wrapper.navigation.Navbar(*items, *, brand=None, inverse=False, right_only=False, top=False, right_items=None, **kwargs)¶

Bases: bootstrap_wrapper.elements.Tag

Our top level navbar tag.

add(*items)¶

Adds items to the navbar, unless right_only True, then it will send the items, to add_right.

add_right(*items)¶

Adds item to the right justified navbar list.

tagname = 'nav'¶
class bootstrap_wrapper.navigation.NavbarBrand(text='', href=None, **kwargs)¶

Bases: bootstrap_wrapper.elements.Div

A navbar brand element. Rendered to the far left before any navbar items.

class bootstrap_wrapper.navigation.NavbarDropdown(*items, **kwargs)¶

Bases: bootstrap_wrapper.elements.Dropdown

A dropdown menu for a navbar.

class bootstrap_wrapper.navigation.NavbarItems(*items, *, right=False, **kwargs)¶

Bases: bootstrap_wrapper.elements.Ul

A <ul> tag to hold all the elements of the navbar, optionally right-justified.

class bootstrap_wrapper.navigation.Tab(text, content=None, content_kwargs={}, href=None, pills=False, active=False, **kwargs)¶

Bases: object

A convenience object to instantiate a tab with it’s content together.

class bootstrap_wrapper.navigation.TabContent(*items, **kwargs)¶

Bases: bootstrap_wrapper.elements.Div

Container that holds all the content for all the tabs of the tabbar. Each tab should have a TabPane that gets added to the class, where the TabPane is the actual content for a particular tab.

class bootstrap_wrapper.navigation.TabPane(*items, *, id='', active=False, fade=True, **kwargs)¶

Bases: bootstrap_wrapper.elements.Div

The actual content for a particular tab.

class bootstrap_wrapper.navigation.Tabbar(*items, *, pills=False, **kwargs)¶

Bases: bootstrap_wrapper.elements.Tag

add(*items)¶
tagname = 'div'¶

Our top level tabbar element.

class bootstrap_wrapper.navigation.TabbarTab(text, href, pills=False, **kwargs)¶

Bases: bootstrap_wrapper.elements.Button

The tabs/pills of a tabbar. This item will probably not be used directly too often, you should use one of the convenience method to create a tab with it’s content.

class bootstrap_wrapper.navigation.TabbarUl(*items, *, pills=False, **kwargs)¶

Bases: bootstrap_wrapper.elements.Ul

A <ul> element that holds the tabs for our tabbar. This element will not be used directly too often, you should use one of the convience methods to add items to the tabbar.

add(*items, *, active=False)¶

class bootstrap_wrapper.BootstrapDocument(*args, *, bootstrap_url='https://maxcdn.bootstrapcdn.com/bootstrap/3.3.6', jquery_url='https://ajax.googleapis.com/ajax/libs/jquery/1.12.0/jquery.min.js', static_folder=None, **kwargs)¶

Bases: bootstrap_wrapper.document.Document

BootstrapDocument.

Adds bootstrap and jquery to a document, with the option to specify a local file system path to load it from or a cdn path.

The following tags are available to add items to.

Head:

The head tag of the document.
Meta:

Stores meta tags inside of the head tag.
Content:

A <div class=’container’ id=’content’> tag. Calling the add method of a document adds items inside of this tag.
Body:

The body of the document.
Scripts:

A <div> below the content, to add <script> tags to.
Parameters:
  • bootstrap_url – A cdn url or path to a static folder.
  • jquery_url – A cdn url or path to a static folder.
  • static_folder – A path in the file system to load from.
add(*items)¶

Adds items to the content div by default.
